name: Standard Room
details: A comfortable standard room with a double bed, private bathroom, and basic amenities.

name: Deluxe Room
details: Spacious room with a king-size bed, seating area, and scenic views.

name: Superior Room
details: An upgraded room with modern decor, a king-size bed, and a luxurious bathroom.

name: Family Room
details: Ideal for families, featuring two double beds, ample space, and child-friendly amenities.

name: Suite Room
details: A luxurious suite with a separate bedroom, living area, and premium facilities.
